Events.PreEventString: Covered by the sand, you find a $1 that may have been lost centuries ago.
Events.PostEventString: You pick it up and continue on your way.

Events.PreEventString: In the distance, you see a black silhouette. As it gets closer, you see an angry $1 trashing about.
Events.PostEventString: The enemy flees, scared. You took its $1 as a prize.

Events.PreEventString: In the distance, you see a black silhouette. As it gets closer, you see an angry $1 trashing about.
Events.PostEventString: The enemy flees, scared. You took its $1 as a prize.

Events.PreEventString: In the center of a stone circle, a huge shining crystal talks to you: YE WHO SEEK AWAKENING, LET US BEGIN.
You reach an oasis where you can rest and regain energy.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered some health.

Events.PreEventString: You find a very tall Sitrus tree.
Events.PostEventString: $1 manages to catch a couple of Sitrus Berries. It is fully healed.

Events.PreEventString: You reach an oasis where you can rest and regain energy.
Events.PostEventString: Your Pokemon have recovered from harmful conditions.

Events.PreEventString: Time to eat some of the Leppa Rations you bought before coming.
Events.PostEventString: You and your Pokemon eat some of them. Their moves recover some PP.

Events.PreEventString: You accidentally step on a pressure plate trap! Suddenly, tons of Pokemon fall from a hole in the roof..
Events.PostEventString: Perhaps this wasn't a trap and just a misunderstanding.

Events.PreEventString: You accidentally step on a pressure plate trap! A lot of Skorupi start crawling from a hole in the wall!
Events.PostEventString: They sting you, and your Pokemon sustain some damage.

Events.PreEventString: You accidentally step on a pressure plate trap! A lot of Skorupi start crawling from a hole in the wall!
Events.PostEventString: They sting you, and some of your Pokemon get badly poisoned.

Events.PreEventString: The ruins contain multiple tablets written in ancient texts. The members of the Archaeological society would probably go crazy about this.
Events.PostEventString: You pick up a $1 that was on the floor.

Events.PreEventString: You enter a set of ruins unlike all previous ones. This one contains weird glypths embedded in the walls. Suddenly, the glyphs come alive and start attacking!.

Floors.ShortcutClue: The sandstorm is a bit more intense in this area. You'll need eye protection to make it through.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 protects your party's vision while you go through the sandstorm.

Floors.ShortcutClue: You see an opening on the ruin's walls, but the instruction is in another language. It resembles the one found in Plates.
Floors.ShortcutResolution: Your $1 has a very similar text to the one in the wall. With a bit of time, you manage to decypher how to open the secret passage.

Floors.ShortcutClue: This is the end of the line. No more shortcuts ahead.

BossEvent.PreEventString: In the center of the ruins, you find a bizarre creature. It is the mythical $1, symbol of ruination.
BossEvent.PostEventString: The boss leaves behind the $1, a precious treasure that was revered by ancient civilisations.

CampingEvent.PreEventString: The desert is harsh, but with enough preparation you should be able to cross it. You should stop for camping whenever possible.
CampingEvent.PostEventString: But for now it's time to move on...
